Package org.neo4j.server.security.auth

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticationStrategy
    Strategy for determining if the credentials presented by a user are valid
    FileRepository  
    UserRepository
    A component that can store and retrieve users.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractUserRepository  
    AuthProcedures  
    AuthProcedures.UserResult  
    BasicLoginContext  
    CommunitySecurityModule  
    FileRepositorySerializer<S>  
    FileUserRepository
    Stores user auth data.
    LegacyCredential
    This class is used for 3.5 community security, InternalFlatFile, SetDefaultAdminCommand and SetInitialPasswordCommand The new security has its own more secure version of Credential
    ListSnapshot<T>  
    RateLimitedAuthenticationStrategy  
    ShiroAuthenticationInfo  
    ShiroAuthToken  
    UserSerialization
    Serializes user authorization and authentication data to a format similar to unix passwd files.
